mainPage.title: Welcome to memoWikis
mainPage.content:
What is memoWikis?

memoWikis is a collaborative learning platform that combines wiki-style content creation with spaced repetition learning.

Key Features

  • Create and Share Knowledge: Build structured wikis on any topic
  • Learn with Flashcards: Generate questions from your content
  • Track Your Progress: Monitor your learning with analytics

Getting Started

Start by exploring existing wikis or create your own. Add questions to test your knowledge and review them regularly for optimal learning.

subpages.title: Creating Your First Wiki
subpages.content:
Step-by-Step Guide

Creating a wiki is easy:

  1. Click the 'New Wiki' button
  2. Enter a title and description
  3. Add your content using the rich text editor
  4. Organize with subpages for complex topics

Tips for Good Wikis

  • Keep topics focused and well-structured
  • Use headings to organize content
  • Add sources for credibility

subpages.title: Learning with Questions
subpages.content:
The Power of Active Recall

Questions help you retain knowledge better through active recall and spaced repetition.

Creating Questions

You can create questions manually or use AI to generate them from your wiki content.

Review Schedule

memoWikis uses spaced repetition to show you questions at optimal intervals for long-term retention.

questions.text: What are the three key features of memoWikis?
questions.solution: Create and Share Knowledge, Learn with Flashcards, Track Your Progress
